cause.description:
This cause is dedicated to helping people realize and take action against the continued pollution of our Earth. The faster we realize we need to help, the longer our children will have to breathe.
1. Action against pollution must be stopped! now or never.
2. Anyway you can make a difference can help
cause.mission: As long as our planet lives, we live. Keep the Earth safe anyway you can.
cause.name: Earth Is More Than A Big, Round Rock!
